summary: mod add Bow and Arrow like in Film with Charlie Shin (Toper Harley) \"Hot Shots2\"
descriptionHtml:
Final version 2.0a
language Russian (Full)
Installation - unpak in ../Data & lock on in Launcher :)

mod add arrow it is look like chicken & have voice than he fly and impact the target.
arrow can be found in some barrels and sacks, from other Live Chicken near Whiterun territory & all other the Skyrim.
There is have Bow. You can craft This one or You can Find somewere.
Enemy can shot Chicken to you & do it if take Chiken-arrow somewere.
Killmove Working

arrow Damage  25, speed less than iron arrow.
Bow like Daedric

Quest was later ... working
author: crimeanhawk
